TopicTitle: How do you update this game?

Articles.Content:
I have Check for game updates checked in settings, but the game does not update. Is this broken?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T04:48:52Z" title="05/03/2015 04:48  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by lost\_in\_space**

Update in launcher does not work 100% times. Best thing to do is update manually.

Go to your KSP folder > KSP\_win > saves and backup your save files; then just delete KSP\_win and download KSP 1.0.2 from KSP website. Extract archive and copy back your save files to the saves folder. This should do it.
